original_title: 心霊曼邪羅4 ～実録！呪われた投稿映像集～
overview: A room that has not been used for many years. My parents told me not to go in, but when I went in and looked into what was there...!?  And, during the recording of a variety show, the photographer found a suspicious person in the back... What was captured by the camera while the lights went down and panicked...!?
title: Psychic Manjara 4
